title: To the Circus
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 456 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 500L, Fiction Series
description: In this fourth book in the Hoppers series, the Hoppers want to go to the circus, but the family can't afford it. Grandpa Grizzly comes to the rescue. Then, Snubby Nose decides he wants to join the circus! Instead, the clowns give him some musical instruments so he can play music at home.
